title: My house got robbed. Can you help retweet this?
selftext:
My house got robbed in South Kolkata. They hacked open the door and broke the bathroom and took whatever the could. This happened twice in one week. My mother lives alone. I need help retweeting this because no one seems to care. 



https://x.com/MoonShine162971/status/1810528631074295971?t=kkMzYhm-bXMVZO7PF6kV5w&s=1
cleaned_text: house got robbed help retweet house got robbed south kolkata hacked open door broke bathroom took whatever could happened twice one week mother lives alone need help retweeting one seems care
